items.sentence: The police found Tom\'s blood on Mary\'s shoes.
It wasn\'t hard to convince Tom not to do that.
It won\'t be as boring to do that as you think.

I\'ve never tasted anything as unusual as this.
I\'ve never wanted anything so much in my life.
I\'ve only spoken to Tom once since I got here.
Tom intervened in his coworkers\' disagreement.

I should call the police and have you arrested.
